Trade/Device Name(s): Disposable Medical Synthetic Nitrile Examination Gloves (Non-Sterile)
Disposable Synthetic Nitrile Examination Gloves (Non Sterile)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for disposable medical synthetic nitrile examination gloves (non-sterile) for prevention of contamination between patient and examiner
Indications for Use Summary: Disposable device intended for medical purposes worn on the examiner's hand to prevent contamination between patient and examiner
